name: GHA Cache node_modules by lockfile
description: Use actions/cache keyed by lockfile to cache node_modules.

files.template:
name: Cache deps

on: [push, pull_request]

jobs:
  cache:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: 20
      - uses: actions/cache@v4
        with:
          path: node_modules
          key: node-${{ hashFiles('package-lock.json', 'pnpm-lock.yaml', 'yarn.lock') }}
          restore-keys: |
            node-
      - run: npm ci
      - run: npm test --silent || echo 'no tests'
